# GRAPHICS::GET_SAFE_ZONE_SIZE

## Summary
Return the safe zone size

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Gets the scale of safe zone. if the safe zone size scale is max, it will return 1.0.
